featured.text: Java developed tea cultivation earlier than India. (C) Tea plants can grow for only a short period of time.
Today, Java, South Africa, South America, and areas of the Caucasus also produce tea.

definition.zh_def: 一種廣泛使用的高級程式語言，特別適用於網絡應用和企業級應用。
definition.en_def: A widely used high-level programming language, particularly suitable for web applications and enterprise-level applications.
definition.example: Java is commonly used for building large-scale applications.
